title: True To Trestles - 2016 TCT Global Champs | Volcom Surf
description:
Purchase Volcom's "True to Trestles" Give Back tee and all the proceeds go to the San Onofre Parks Foundation who is providing education, protection & preservation for the California State Parks at San Onofre and San Clemente State Beaches.

2016 TCT Global Champs @ Lower Trestles, June 14-17 features the world's best 20 & Under surfers battling it out for a $30,000 prize purse and the ultimate title of a TCT Global Champion!

asset.title: True To Trestles - 2016 TCT Global Champs | Volcom Surf
asset.description:
2016 TCT Global Champs @ Lower Trestles, June 14-17 features the world's best 20 & Under surfers battling it out for a $30,000 prize purse and the ultimate title of a TCT Global Champion!

Watch the live webcast on June 16-17 at http://tct.volcom.com
asset.author: Volcom

transcripts: Our main goal is True to Trestles to tread lightly, bring awareness and give back. It's an honor to be able to work with sustainable surf, surfrider foundation, under swell, San Onofre Parks Foundation, and the state parks, and bring a great event down the Trestles. As the event organizer sustainability is the number one for us here at trestles this is one of the last natural water sheds in Southern California and we want to come down here and leave an event that's cleaner than when we showed up and we welcome back next year. When you purchase Volcoms True to trestles products 100% of the proceeds go to California State parks you can purchase them at Volcom.com, here on site, or any of our Southern California local retailers.
